summary: DRIVING ON A 3 LANE HEAVILY TRAFFICKED ROAD, AND ALL OF A SUDDEN MY DRIVE SHAFT FALLS OUT OF MY TRUCK. THIS LOCKED MY WHEELS UP, STARTED SHAKING MY TRUCK VIOLENTLY. I WAS EXTREMELY LUCKY THAT SOMEONE WAS NOT DIRECTLY BEHIND OR ADJACENT OF ME BECAUSE IT WOULD'VE RESULTED IN A SURE COLLISION.
